description: Nightly co-living accommodation rates can be around 40 per cent cheaper than hotels in Orchard. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: I stayed in a co-living apartment in Orchard that costs $126 a night. Was it worth the price?
title_page: I stayed in a co-living apartment in Orchard that costs $126 a night. Was it worth the price? | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE â€“ Every so often, I dream of staying in Orchard Road. The area is, after all, known for being a premier lifestyle destination, with high-end malls and an array of food and beverage options.
But along the bustling boulevard, hotel prices are steep.
